title: Creepy Little Thing Called Love
description:
This episode is all about love...and the terrifying lengths some will go for it.  Sapphire shares a famous ghost story from Thailand, explains the rules of the Love Me Game, saves a soul under a spell, and tells an old Japanese legend.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
